name: Mo Slider
author: MoDuet

sections.description:
Display an image slider using post IDs in WordPress. A WordPress widget plugin that displays a slider from specific posts. This plugin will display a slider in any widget area. The slider will show the featured image, title and excerpt. The slider is responsive; visibly clean display and functionality on any device (mobile or desktop).

Features

  • Display responsive post slider on phone, tablet and desktop
  • Displays the post featured image, title and excerpt
  • Lightweight and loads quickly
  • BXSLIDER
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can multiple Mo Sliders be inserted into one page or post?

Yes. More than one Mo Slider can be inserted into a page or post.

Does this work in WordPress Widgets?

Yes.

What if I have questions or need help?

First, check the the support section. Second, contact us at MoDuet
